steps.title: Draw a squash shape.
steps.content: Draw a squash shape.

steps.title: Draw a triangle in the center of the top of your squash.
steps.content: Draw a triangle in the center of the top of your squash.

steps.title: Draw two circles slightly above the triangle.
steps.content: Draw two circles slightly above the triangle.

steps.title: Draw two, darker circles inside of the circles already drawn.
steps.content: Draw two, darker circles inside of the circles already drawn.

steps.title: Draw a squiggle-line extending from the triangle.
steps.content: Draw a squiggle-line extending from the triangle.

steps.title: Draw elongated ovals extended from the squash, until it resembles a fan.
steps.content: Draw elongated ovals extended from the squash, until it resembles a fan.

steps.title: Draw two, even lines extending from the bottom of the turkey.
steps.content: Draw two, even lines extending from the bottom of the turkey.

steps.title: Draw two diagonal lines, extending from close to the bottom of the lines.
steps.content: Draw two diagonal lines, extending from close to the bottom of the lines.

steps.title: Shade your turkey in the desired colors.
steps.content: Shade your turkey in the desired colors.

steps.title: Finished.
steps.content: Finished.

steps.title: Draw a circle.
steps.content: Draw a circle.

steps.title: Sketch a small circle on the right side of the big circle.
steps.content: Sketch a small circle on the right side of the big circle. Connect the small circle with the big one using two curved lines so that it will look like a head, neck and body. Add two curved lines that make a pointed angle on the head for the beak.

steps.title: Sketch two lines with an angle attached to the body.
steps.content: Sketch two lines with an angle attached to the body. Draw a triangle on the ends of each line for the turkey’s legs.

steps.title: Draw a fan-like structure on the rear part of the turkey.
steps.content: Draw a fan-like structure on the rear part of the turkey.

steps.title: Draw the eyes using small circles.
steps.content: Draw the eyes using small circles. Add a curved line line for the eyebrows. Draw the mouth and a dot for the nostril.

steps.title: Draw the neck and the caruncles using curved lines cascading from the beak to the neck.
steps.content: Draw the neck and the caruncles using curved lines cascading from the beak to the neck.

steps.title: Draw the wings using a big fluffy shape with three curved lines for the feathers.
steps.content: Draw the wings using a big fluffy shape with three curved lines for the feathers.

steps.title: Using the outline, sketch out the turkey’s body and add the legs.
steps.content: Using the outline, sketch out the turkey’s body and add the legs. Sketch a series of curved lines forming a collar just below the neck for feather design.

steps.title: Draw the feet.
steps.content: Draw the feet. A turkey’s feet has three claws in front and a small one at the back.

steps.title: Sketch two layers containing a series of curved lines for the turkey’s fan-like tail.
steps.content: Sketch two layers containing a series of curved lines for the turkey’s fan-like tail. Make the second layer bigger and more elaborate than the first one.

steps.title: Erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Erase unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Color the drawing.
steps.content: Color the drawing.

steps.title: Draw a big circle for the body and an oblong overlapping the big circle on the right side.
steps.content: Draw a big circle for the body and an oblong overlapping the big circle on the right side.

steps.title: Add a small circle for the head and connect this to the oblong using two curved lines that serves as the neck.
steps.content: Add a small circle for the head and connect this to the oblong using two curved lines that serves as the neck. Add two small curved lines that form a pointed angle to the right side of the head for the beak.

steps.title: Draw lines for a rough outline of the legs and add a triangle on each end for the feet.
steps.content: Draw lines for a rough outline of the legs and add a triangle on each end for the feet.

steps.title: Draw a curved line on the left side of the turkey and a fan-like structure for the tail attached to the curved line.
steps.content: Draw a curved line on the left side of the turkey and a fan-like structure for the tail attached to the curved line.

steps.title: Draw the eyes and define the beak.
steps.content: Draw the eyes and define the beak. Draw the snood and the caruncles of the neck using curved strokes.

steps.title: Sketch out the body, taking note of the feather patterns.
steps.content: Sketch out the body, taking note of the feather patterns. Note that the back portion of the turkey is a little bumpy so you can sketch out a few outlines of the feathers too.

steps.title: Darken the fan-like shape of the turkey’s tail.
steps.content: Darken the fan-like shape of the turkey’s tail.

steps.title: Sketch and define the legs and toes.
steps.content: Sketch and define the legs and toes.

steps.title: Draw random small strokes all over the turkey’s body for a feathery appearance.
steps.content: Draw random small strokes all over the turkey’s body for a feathery appearance.

steps.title: Erase unnecessary lines and refine the feathers using small curved strokes.
steps.content: Erase unnecessary lines and refine the feathers using small curved strokes.

steps.title: Color the drawing.
steps.content: Color the drawing.

steps.title: Draw an oblong with an overlapping big circle below it.
steps.content: Draw an oblong with an overlapping big circle below it. This will form the sketch for the turkey’s body and head.

steps.title: Draw the details of the turkey’s head using circles and curve lines for the beak.
steps.content: Draw the details of the turkey’s head using circles and curve lines for the beak.

steps.title: Draw details for the wattle and the head.
steps.content: Draw details for the wattle and the head.

steps.title: Draw the turkey’s hat or toque to look like a cartoon.
steps.content: Draw the turkey’s hat or toque to look like a cartoon.

steps.title: Draw details for the left wing using curve lines and also for the feet.
steps.content: Draw details for the left wing using curve lines and also for the feet.

steps.title: Draw the right wing which holds a ladle.
steps.content: Draw the right wing which holds a ladle. Draw also details for the cooking pot.

steps.title: Draw the turkey’s fan-shaped tail and details for the feathers.
steps.content: Draw the turkey’s fan-shaped tail and details for the feathers.

steps.title: Trace with a black pen.
steps.content: Trace with a black pen.

steps.title: Color to your liking, then design the background.
steps.content: Color to your liking, then design the background.

steps.title: Draw a horizontally elongated oblong.
steps.content: Draw a horizontally elongated oblong.

steps.title: Draw a more flattened and elongated oblong below the first with an inner overlapping oblong.
steps.content: Draw a more flattened and elongated oblong below the first with an inner overlapping oblong. This will be the plate.

steps.title: Draw the details for the cut head, wings, and butt.
steps.content: Draw the details for the cut head, wings, and butt.

steps.title: Draw an oblong near the butt with small circles or oblongs below it.
steps.content: Draw an oblong near the butt with small circles or oblongs below it.

steps.title: Draw the details for the turkey’s leg with a sketch for the leg bone.
steps.content: Draw the details for the turkey’s leg with a sketch for the leg bone. Draw details for leaves.

steps.title: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary lines. Add details.

steps.title: Color to your liking!
steps.content: Color to your liking!
